actions.name: Salt Cure
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets are afflicted with @UUID[Compendium.ptr2e.core-effects.Item.SENukczAWLKe8spK]{Salted} for 5 Activations. Salt Cured creatures take a tick of HP damage at the end of each of their Activations. Steel-type and Water-type creatures take 2 ticks of HP damage at the end of each of their Activations instead. Salt Cure's duration cannot be refreshed; and the effect ends when the duration ends, the creature is switched out, gains @Affliction[fainted] or combat ends.
